item.title: Aircraft Engines
item.description:
Aircraft Engines

Aircraft engines

Reliability and perfect quality. These are the engine features for aircraft manufactured by our company. We also provide a full range of support services.

We are an expert in aircraft engines

We have over 20 years of experience in the production of engines for the aviation industry.

JetSpeed 5000

Excellent and powerful engine for medium-sized jets. Designed and created by a team of experienced mechanics, engineers and aviation experts.

  • Compact design
  • Excellent thrust-to-weight ratio, low power consumption
  • Max. thrust: 1,300 N*
  • Outer diameter: 272 mm
  • Length: 625 mm
  • Weight: 90.5 kg

Our services for aircraft engines

  • Parts and engine lease
  • Repair Management
  • Spare Parts Supply

  • Basic servicing
  • Full annual servicing
  • Oil and filter changes

Other products

Super Charged Engine v12

Detalles

Centurion 3000

Detalles

Marine-XT 550

Detalles
View All

Related articles

Reference content

Centurion V750 is the fastest airplane engine on the planet

DrooplerEngines together with Airplanes Pro tested new aircraft engine Centurion V750 on Mojave desert in California, USA.
Learn more

ABC Automotive bought 10 000 engines from DrooplerEngines

ABC Automotive is world leader in car manufacturing. Our engines will be used in their new car models UMI 4S coupe.
Learn more

DrooplerEngines at Automotive Expo 2019

In last week we presented our engines on the biggest expo in the Europe in Hannover, Germany.
Learn more

New factory location

Finally we have another factory. Factory is located in Radom in Poland. This location is well communicated with rest of the Europe.
Learn more
Call To Action
View all

item.title: Boat Engines
item.description:
Boat Engines

Boat engines

We manufacture modern engines for boats and ships. Our experts from the maritime industry are constantly developing our range of products.

We are an expert in boat engines

We have over 20 years of experience in the production of engines for marine industry.

Future B400

Excellent and powerful engine for speed boats. A wide range of power. Designed and created by a team of experienced mechanics, engineers and marine experts.

  • Engine performance: 1 x 4 HP / 2.9 kW
  • Fuel type: gasoline
  • Boat type: outboard
  • Max speed: 250 km/h
  • Fuel consumption: 5l / 100 miles

Our services for boat engines

  • Basic servicing
  • Full annual servicing
  • Oil and filter changes

  • Transmission fluid inspection
  • Water pump replacement
  • And more ...

Other products

Super Charged Engine v12

Detalles

Centurion 3000

Detalles

Marine-XT 550

item.title: Gasoline Engines
item.description:
Gasoline Engines

Gasoline engines

We offer several models of gasoline engines for the automotive market. We manufacture complete sets of engines and also offer parts for petrol engines.

We are an expert in car engines

We have over 20 years of experience in the production of engines for automotive industry.

Cobra 100

Excellent and powerful gasoline engine for cars. A wide range of power. Designed and created by a team of experienced mechanics and engineers. Perfect for small city cars and large SUVs.

  • 1.4 L (1,360 cc) Euro 5 70-72 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 5 72-88 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 4 103-120 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 5 103-120 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 4 128-152 kW

Our services for gasoline engines

  • Change the engine oil
  • Replace the oil filter
  • Replace the spark plugs

  • Inspect and replace the timing belt
  • Check for any Error codes in the ECU
  • Use scan tool read trouble code

Other products

Super Charged Engine v12

Detalles

Centurion 3000

Detalles

Marine-XT 550

item.title: Diesel Engines
item.description:
Diesel Engines

Diesel engines

The diesel engine has the highest effective efficiency of all combustion engines. We produce next-gen diesel engines for modern cars.

We are an expert in car engines

We have over 20 years of experience in the production of engines for automotive industry.

Magnat 2001

Excellent and powerful diesel engine for cars. A wide range of power. Designed and created by a team of experienced mechanics and engineers. Perfect for small city cars and large SUVs.

  • 1.4 L (1,360 cc) Euro 5 70-72 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 5 72-88 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 4 103-120 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 5 103-120 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 4 128-152 kW

Our services for diesel engines

  • Change the engine oil
  • Replace the oil filter
  • Replace the spark plugs

  • Inspect and replace the timing belt
  • Check for any Error codes in the ECU
  • Use scan tool read trouble code

item.title: Car engines
item.description:
Car engines

Car engines

We produce a wide range of car engines for both: diesel and gasoline. We provide engines with low, medium power for cars and high power for sports vehicles.

We are an expert in car engines

We have over 20 years of experience in the production of engines for automotive industry.

Centurion V750

Excellent and powerful diesel engine for cars. A wide range of power. Designed and created by a team of experienced mechanics and engineers. Perfect for small city cars and large SUVs.

  • 1.4 L (1,360 cc) Euro 5 70-72 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 5 72-88 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 4 103-120 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 5 103-120 kW
  • 1.6 L (1,598 cc) Euro 4 128-152 kW

About us

Efficiency & innovation

We have over 20 years of experience in the production of high-class engines. We not only deliver products but also provide full technical support.

Contact us

Our Strategy

Our company's mission is to provide excellent and reliable products
with high-quality customer service.

Work with Us
